title: Problem Solving and Mathematical Reasoning

vocab.definition: Using logical thinking to analyze and solve mathematical problems
A planned approach or method for solving a problem
An educated guess about a mathematical pattern or relationship
A logical argument that shows why a mathematical statement is true
An example that shows a statement or conjecture is false

teachingNotes: Emphasize multiple solution strategies. Encourage students to explain their reasoning. Practice identifying patterns and making mathematical arguments.
